info.author: Sidnei da Silva
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Entransit enables Zope/Plone websites to transactionally push content
to a remote system where it can be processed using simple
transformation pipelines for delivering by your preferred web
server/web framework. Sample implementations of delivery frontends are
provided for Java, PHP, mod_python/vampire and Microsoft
.NET. Entransit builds on top of known existing libraries and
frameworks, including sqlobject, ZConfig, ZEO's zrpc, rdflib and
xapian.
info.name: entransit
info.summary: Entransit - a push approach to content delivery
info.html_description: Entransit enables Zope/Plone websites to transactionally push content to a remote system where it can be processed using simple transformation pipelines for delivering by your preferred web server/web framework. Sample implementations of delivery frontends are provided for Java, PHP, mod_python/vampire and Microsoft .NET. Entransit builds on top of known existing libraries and frameworks, including sqlobject, ZConfig, ZEO’s zrpc, rdflib and xapian.
